name: Inxite Information Industry
overview: Inxite Information Industry Co., Ltd. provides professional financial information services and technology solutions to enterprises and private investors. It collects, processes, analyses, and develops a financial information database that covers information related to stocks, securities, funds, futures, bonds, banks, insurances, foreign exchange, gold, macro-economy, higher learning institutions, industrial data, financial information, market analysis, media, and other fields. The company, through its wealth management terminal, provides basic information research, buying and selling indicators analysis, and consultant services related to investors. It also offers a personalized security mobile message service, which enables brokers to provide investment relevant messages to investors. In addition, Inxite Information Industry Co., Ltd. develops VIP customer service terminals, which facilitate security information, deep stock information, and accounting analysis report and transaction guidelines that serve various requirements of brokers; investment banks support platform, which enables cooperation between people and help management to trace projects and control risks, as well as to enhance work efficiency of investment banks; and broker Web sites that offer various resources and services to financial service institutions. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. As of January 23, 2008, Inxite Information Industry Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of New Huadu Industrial Group Co., Ltd.

offices.address2: No.9 Building, No.20, 91st Lane, Ershan Road
